package.name: Heliomalt´s XVM Config
package.description:
Bei dieser XVM Konfiguration sind nachfolgende Änderungen enthalten:

Hangar:
Gold und Free XP Locker, Premium Buttons entfernt, 3 Panzerreihen, alle Perks sichtbar (bis 8 Stück), Uhr, Garagen Stellplatz und Panzer kaufen Box entfernt, Anzeige der aktiven Reserven mit Icons und Timer, erweiterte Info im Popup für Panzer, Auto Return Crew standardmässig an, automatischer Einbau von Schere, Tarnnetz und Werkzeugkiste, Flaggen in der Kaserne, automatischer Login (nicht in Minimal XVM), Modpack Check im Hangar, Server Info in den Hangarkopf verschoben, Tages- und Gesamtstatistik, Gunmark mit Fortschritt, Gunmark Icon, Siegrate und Panzerass Icon für den ausgewählten Panzer (nicht im Karussell), allgemeiner Chat entfernt.

Im Spiel:
Team HP Anzeige, Panzerklasse Anzeige mit Zähler, wahlweise auch Standard, XMQP Marker, Icon für Spieler die auf der Freundesliste sind, Spotted Marker für das gegnerische Team, Playerspanel Switcher entfernt, lässt sich mit Strg+Tab umschalten, Gunmarkanzeige im Playerpanel, Hitpoint Balken, wahlweise erweiterte Anzeige im Playerspanel und auf der Minimap beim drücken von ALT, unter anderem Panzer- und Spielername, erweiterte Kreise auf der Minimap inkl. Proxyspottingkreis 50m, HP Anzeige mit Kreis für jeden Panzer auf der Minimap, Zentrierung der Minimap beim drücken von Strg, Reparatur Timer im Damage Panel, erweiterte Infos im Fadenkreuz für Arcade-, Sniper- und Artyansicht, z.B. Distanz, normalisierter Geschosswinkel, Durchschlagsanzeige, Flugzeit, Einzielzeit, Munitionsart mit Zähler, Arty Splash Radius, optische Anzeige vom Vanilla Autoaim (kein erweitertes AA, kein Snapping oder sonstige grenzwertige Modifikationen), Safe Shot, lässt sich deaktivieren durch gedrückt halten von F12, bleibt aber sonst aktiv, optional leicht angepasste Sounds, z.B. kein Minimap Ping, kein Chat Ping, Geladen und andere Capture Sirenen, UT Frags Announcer optional, Battle Chat auf 2 Linien begrenzt, Max Zoom out.

package.description:
One of the biggest XVM prebuilts around, 
including most of the options provided in the xvm config builder section
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
NOT compatible to battle observer! (all on board!)
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
CAMERA tweaked:
zoomsteps (2,4,8,12,16,20,26,32,40,48),
start zoom 2x,
zoom indicator,
arcade/postmortem/strategic zoom out (500m)
removed TD brake in sniper mode,
increased scroll speed
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
NOT compatible to following XVM_Config_Builder parts (because already built-in!):
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
Battle Interface Modifications
- Information Label for Missions (Mission Tracker)
- Scoreboard
- Total HP
- InfoPanel
- High Caliber Tracker
- Target Info
- DebugPanel
- Piercing Chance
- Show Aim Info
- WN8 Comparison
- Average Damage
- PreBattleMessages
- Total Efficiency
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
Tank Carousel modifications (xvm)
- Enable XVM Tank Cells ( CaronteShinigami carousel config is used) 
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
Players Panel Modifications (xvm)
- Friends-Marker
- Show who´s using XVM (xvmUserMarker)
- Show language flag
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
Marker modifications (xvm) (OMC markers are used)
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
Battle Chat
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -


Kudos go out to:

OMC (Grumpelumpf), 
night_dragon_on, 
ktulho, 
Diclovit, 
OldSkool, 
Solo,
Ress, 
Aslain, 
J1mb0, 
Heliomalt, 
SmashPuppet, 
Kornet_WA, 
MIAPAK, 
Kotyarko_O, 
Tornado_Odan_Rot,

package.name: Information Label for Missions (Mission Tracker)
package.description:
This label positioned under the left PlayersPanel shows you many informations you need for missions or for your daily games too. 
Examples for that are your damage, damage of your platoon members, damage of you and your platoon members together, number of enemys you spotted, number of critical hits you made, number of enemys your complete platoon killed, damage through reconnaissance and chain destruction, damage through spotting only, damage through chain destruction only, damage you got, hits you got and damage you blocked. 

Information Label for Missions by MarsOne: http://forum.worldoftanks.eu/index.php?/topic/340002-09151-omc-modpack-installer-mit-bild-video-vorschau-letztes-update-siehe-wwwodemmortiscom/page__st__4980__pid__13912513#entry13912513

package.name: Piercing Chance (possible Penetration Indicator conflict!)
package.description:
Like the penatration indicator, this mod shows if you have a chance to penetrate the enemy.

format: 
current own gun penetration / actual enemy armor

colors:
green = chance to pierce
red = no chance to pierce

package.description:
Pogs Contour Icons - continued by DaMatz (2019-) thx DaMatz 
Pogs Contour Icons - continued by Solo (2017-2018) thx Solo

abbreviations:
DMG - damage | PEN - penetration | RLD - reload
HP - Hit Points | VR - view range | FSR - front sides rear

De​sc​ri​ption:
PENETRATION - It’s average penetration with standard AP shell, in gold gold shells
DAMAGE - It’s avarage damage with standard AP shell, HE shell for artillery
ARMOR - It’s normal - nothing in pack name - or FSR:
- Normal - REAR·SIDES·FRONT armor RSF
- FSR - FRONT·SIDES·REAR armor
HP - Hit points with upgraded turret
View range - view range with upgraded turret
Reload time - time to reload gun / drum in autoloader

package.name: Damage Logs
package.description:
Damage Logs create a list of taken damage. 
In the list you find detailed information about who was shooting at you and how much HP these shots have taken from you.

We provide you some fine configurations with different layouts and colors, but you have to figure out yourself which one fits best to the rest of your installed modifications.

Legal Info from WG employe Dance210:
Hey Silvers_,

We are currently working on the creation of a process that will more formally vet mods.

In the meantime, I do not personally feel that the mod you are asking about specifically violates the guidelines listed in the fair play policy. That said, those could change in the future and we do not recommend the use of any third-party mods, especially ones that may eventually be determined to provide an unfair information advantage.

To enable or disable this mod, press the Right-ALT key.

package.name: MeltyElement EffectiveArmorPanel (by elementofprgress)
package.description:
The effective armor calculator does, well exactly what it sounds like it does. 
It gives you real time information about the actual thickness of your hulls armor based on angle of your tank compared to where you are looking/aiming.
It also displays gun constraints.

It´s a remake of the ArmorPanel (& Protractor) that was included in the original MeltyMap sights. 
This mod shows front and side armor in current line of view (side armor without trucks).
(as i got asked: you DO NOT see the lines on the picture)

Attention! 
This mod was released by its developer as ALPHA!

Known Bugs:
When changing the volume level with windows-shortcuts or over the keyboard (if your keyboard got this) there will be a light red ball appearing on the screen. this is meant for debugging the mod by the developers and currently can´t get disabled!

package.name: Number Indicator of Armor Penetration ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) by Makct (non-PMOD)
package.description: Shows a number of chance of penetration. The number is calculated by (enemy_effective_armor-gun_average_penetration).\nNegative number means likely to bounce.\nPositive number means likely to pierce.

prevents you from shooting your gun to hit allies/dead tanks/etc.

package.name: SafeShot by OldSkool
package.description: SafeShot is preventing team damage to allied tanks. This mod offers you a nice interface and the option to configure it ingame.

package.name: SafeShot by PROTanki
package.description: The SafeShot mod is the disabling of accidental firing on corpses and allies for World of Tanks 1.0.1.1. A very useful mod that will save you from firing on already killed tanks. Example, you shoot the enemy is not one and finish it off, but you already poke without stopping the button and shoot into the already killed tank and leave not the CD. With this mod, this will not happen again. Also, the mod will help protect your account from your children or those who do not know people who can start shooting at their allies.

package.name: Premium (Gold) Shell Visibility Mod by lgfrbcsgo
package.description:
Features
- Changes the color of hit effects
- Multiple colors choices available
- Works for all tanks in both teams
- Recolors penetrating hits, bouncing shots, ricochets, shots hitting the ground or other objects
- Does NOT recolor none penetrating hits or shots into water

This mod adds a short sparkling effect to penetrating APCR/HEAT hits. Not only will you be able to tell if an enemy tank is shooting gold rounds at your allied tanks (or at you), but also if one of your allies is a gold spammer. This information will help you determining whether to engage or not to engage an enemy.

FAQ
Q: The Mod isn't working.
A: Make sure Extra Effects are enabled in the settings under Graphics.

package.name: Wide Border of Maps
package.description:
Mod is made to help people with color blindness. The line, that indicates the border of maps, is expanded to the edges of the map. Now don't notice her is almost impossible. "Full" and "Light" differ only in the degree of compressibility. 
WIDE - the border of maps is expanded to the edges of the map.
INTENSIVE - the border of maps is made in the thickness of 20 pixels (on the standard = 1 pixel).
GRID - into the version "INTENSIVE" added the grid lines 10x10.
EXTRAGRID - into the version "INTENSIVE" added the grid lines 50x50.
COMMAND - into the version "GRID" added the big numbering squares card.
SPG - into the version "GRID" added the small numbering squares card.

package.name: Antitoxicity Mod by ShuraBB
package.description:
**Please note that not all features are currently implimented into the modpack.**

Fashion features:
Filtering "combat commands" (Attention to the square, Need help, Attack, etc.) 
Filtering messages from commands in the chat 
Filtering the clicks on the minimap 
Filtering the display of commands on the minimap 
Configure the filter restrictions (command type, count, time delay, type of combat) 
Ability to block commands from killed allies 
Setting the flashing time of the highlighted square on the minimap 
Filtering messages in the combat chat 
Filtering the message according to the specified pattern, including using regular expressions
The ability to block the message From dead players 
Autocorrect a message for a given template
Setting the filter limits (number, time delay, type of battle) 
Setting the time of the message display and the time of its "dissolving" 
Ability to completely turn off the chat in the replicas 
Dimensionless "black list" 
Dimension list of friends 
Dynamic platoon 
message filter Customizable filter of pop-up messages in the hangar 
Customizable filter messages in the system channel, including using regular expressions 
Customizable message filter above the minimap 
Customizable message filter above the hardware panel 
About deletion of the message about the destruction of the tank: "The machine is destroyed ..."; 
Disabling the posthumous prompt panel;

The developer asks that if you like his work, please give him a positive rating on wgmods:
https://wgmods.net/search/?owner=70

package.name: Hawg´s Tactical Minimap
package.description: Hawg’s -Spg - TD - Passive Scout -Tactical Minimap’s “. Some of the top WOT Clans DONT want you to see or have this .Most good players use the minimap as a major tool in battle . So I took from these web sites “Maps Tactics” & “Guru maps” and other Discrete web sites. They show the best place to set up in Arty & Td . I mark the spots on the minimap where Arty & Td is Most Likely to set up. It shows the best strategic place for arty & td to set up ,This mod will show In Battle,So you don’t have to try to remember where to go. You can use this for “Counter Battery” or You can set up your Arty or TD in these spots. The arty icons are not to bold, just enough to see them on the minimap. This mod is great for Clan Wars !

package.name: Tech HD Minimap v{version} by WOTInspector
package.description:
Changes minimaps to new topographical (tech) maps.

All maps are created automatically using heights data of the maps.

Resolution 2048х2048.

Benefits of using tech maps:
- higher resolution 2048x2048
- clear display of no-go areas
- display of every bush, tree and destructible object
- altitude display by color and isolines
- every minimap is made in the same unique style because the images are generated by script

Some indestructible objects are marked as destructibles due to limitations of the game client.

Images are provided by wotinspector.com

package.name: by CHAMPi
package.description:
This mod allows you to control how many times a player can click on the minimap before the clicks will be ignored from your client. \r
You can also control if a click sound is played.
\r
All options are fully customizable in a settings dialog. \r
You can reach it by pressing ESC in the hangar. 



Credits:
-spoter - for the permission to use his settings mod in my mod.
-Elkano - this mod is based on his idea of a ping spam blocker.
-spion_ve, Enesian - for help with the language files.
Feel free to send me your feedback, suggestions and/or bug-reports via private message here on the forum.

package.name: ElkMPSB by Elkano's
package.description:
This modification will block minimap ping spam by enforcing certain restrictions:
Within a given timeframe (10 seconds by default) a player can only create a given number (3 by default) minimap pings to different and a single ping to an individual cell. Further pings will be noted and keep that player blocked.

 
Feel free to try it in its current state and to comment either here or on CurseForge.

package.name: OfflineMode Launcher
package.description:
This mod can start maps offline.
There is no tank and no gui, only the blank map to explore!
Only Works From Login Screen
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
How to use:

1.Click the MOD list in the lower right corner of the login screen
2.Click on item OfflineMode Launcher
-> Launcher window opens
3.Select a map
4.Click the Load button
-> The map will load
5.Press the F key
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Keys:

WSAD: move camera
Numpad +/-: adjust FOV
Mouse Wheel: adjust speed
Escape: toggle mouse mode
F: toggle camera freeze mode
R: add new camera view point
0-7: change camera view point
N: move to previous camera view point
M: move to next camera view point
P: toggle post-precessing
C: toggle cinematic post-processing mode
T: toggle temporal AA
END: Game will quit
Alt+F4: , Game will quit.
PrtSc/SysRq: ScreenShot
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
About camera speed:
1.Copy the engine_config.xml from res/ to res_mods/1.1.0.1
2.Open XML file,edit ui/straferate value.
3.Save,Close.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Contact：Twitter 
alphasave1
Special Thanks : 
chirimenspiral , koreanrandom’s MODders

package.name: Hangar Manager (HangMan) v{version}
package.updateComment:
Version 2.29.1:
- fixed bug in combination with battlehits 

Version 2.28.1:
- regained cap-circles-removement
- some fixes
- added preview-picture for remembrance-day-hangar
- left-CTRL + left-click on HangMan-button in lobby reloads hangar; if you are a tank-preview, client switches back and reloads tank (with selected modules), little help for skinners

Version 2.28:
- adapted for 1.2.0
- disabling cap-circles does not work (would cause a crash-to-desktop), function disabled (although still in config)

Version 2.27:
- adapted for 1.1.0
- some bug-fixes

Version 2.26.2:
- added preview-pictures for new hangars in 1.0.2.4
- fixed issue where camera moved to max. distance after returning from customization-room

Version 2.26.1:
- bug-fix: when showing a tank in vehicle-preview, the camouflage from selected tank in garage was displayed on this tank

Version 2.26:
- improved 'move hangar-vehicle window":
\t- accessible via middle-mousebutton-click on HangMan-button and/or added "move"-button in main HangMan-window
\t- textfields for coordinates etc. are editable now
\t- added buttons to reset values, save hangar and cancel process
- language-files are no longer created on runtime, all (?) available languages included (moved to separate folder, proper translations still welcome)
- some bug-fixes
Updating config (at least language-folder) is needed.

Update 2.25:

- adapted for 1.0.2
- added option to remove the 'please-buy-me-tank' in hangar
- fixed not working 'nation'-mode
- added some more hangars; config changed so 'nation'-mode makes more sense now
- removed Buffon from non-event-hangars (sorry Gianluigi, I like you anyway)
- moved text in 'move-hangar-vehicle'-mode into new draggable window
- some localisations are made during runtime by 'https://tech.yandex.com/translate/', might contain errors
- code-redesign
Please delete/update your existing config.

Update 2.24.2:
- fixed a bug which could prevent a proper start into battle (under certain circumstances)

V2.24: FIXES removing GUI on camera-movements & not-visible cap-circles under certain circumstances
- added: change vehicle-position and -orientation in hangar by pressing LALT + F12, changeable in settings-window and save this as new hangar.

2018-04-08: cap circles will be shown in any case (deactivated experimental HangMan function)
Version 2.21.1:
- regained camouflage-functionality (no winter-camo in desert-hangars etc.)
package.description:
Hello friends!
I want you to meet my HangarManager "HangMan".

Features:

Creating your own hangar during a battle by saving the map and tank position
Possibility to make separate sound settings for each hangar
Change the hangar by:
selector-window or by pressing keys on keyboard 
random (on login and after battle)
depending on nation of selected vehicle
last known position on map of last battle 
Automatic reading of all installed hangars (with exclusion list)
settings-window for keyboard-settings
preview-images installabe (new since 2.2)

 (original files by WG as template =>No Patches needed)


https://wgmods.net/2474/details/
package.description:
Hiroyuki Sawano is a Japanese composer and musician best known for his work on many anime, TV series, and movies.

In this mod you will be able to enjoy his epic soundtracks while playing tanks !
Soundtracks are chosen from famous animes such as Attack On Titan, Re:Creators, Mobile Suit Gundam Unicorn, Aldnoah.Zero, etc.

Music in following places will be replaced:
Hanger, Battle, Loading screen, Win/Lose/Draw screen

============================================================

Sawano’s work has been made into wot mod since 2013 and I had a lot of good experiences while using it, but I’m so sad that the original mod maker is no longer active. So I decide to make this mod and bring those experiences back to players!

============================================================

package.name: Camouflages Selector by Polyacov_Yury
package.updateComment:
2. devURL: https://koreanrandom.com/forum/topic/35250-

02-05/05/2018 (WoT 1.0.1)
 The mod added inscriptions, posters and effects.
 Normally sorted items in the carousel. 

04-Mar-03.2018
Edit under 1.0.0.
03/07/2018

Fixed the application of camouflage on cars, in which the tower is technically absent, but in fact - no.
2.0.0 (02.02.2018 - 27.02.2017)

Version number is pushed to 2.0. Because, well, you see, the previous jump from 0.9.0 to 2.0.0 was not very justified.
All is rewritten. percent on 99. Only a couple of minor functions in ConfigInterface remained unchanged.
Logic is adjusted to a new system of customization.
Now, to configure and install camouflage used an external view from the VG. It is called - as in the previous version, via the button in ModsListAPI.
The "hot key" is removed. To install a randomly selected randomly selected camouflage, open the Camouflage Settings menu - randomly installed camouflage will be displayed as changes made by the player, which, if that, can also be edited before use.
The logic of random selection of camouflage was revised. Now most of the operations for their selection are made at the beginning of the battle, and not when the technique appears in the light.
Added a tick in the settings - "Fill in empty spaces". If it costs and the machine is not painted completely - KamoSelector specially for you will decorate it. If the tick is not necessary - KamoSelector will process only those cars on which there is no camouflage at all.
Added a tick in the settings - "One camouflage for the whole tank." If it costs - KamoSelector will try to choose the same coloring for all parts of the car. If not, or such selection is impossible (on two elements of the armor are different camouflage) - for each empty seat will be matched its casual camouflage. The previous tick also affects the operation of this part of the logic - if there is any coloring on the machine - it will be excluded from the processing by the random selection module of camouflage.
The old camouflagesCache.json and settings.json files are NOT compatible with the new version of the mod. The first will have to be removed, the second one can be overwritten by the fact that it comes with the mod.
Alas, now camouflage has no names. Only numeric identifiers. This does not apply to fashion-added camouflage - in fact, their configs are supported without editing. But the mandatory fields are now 3 pieces for camouflage instead of the horror that was going on there.
"Overwriters," who were devilish devils, renamed "Command camouflage." Now everything fell into place.
Types are renamed to the seasons.
Modified camouflage have been renamed into their own.
Removed restrictions on the change of seasons and modes of random selection of camouflage. If you want a tank in a deserted camouflage ride on a winter map, it's up to you.
10/28/2017

The analytics now shows the date of the compilation of the mod.
Turn off the repainting of Frankie and Stein.
10/09/2017

Edit under the general test (correctly catch Exception when reading the config).
Fixed a rare crash during combat loading.
2.5.6 (14/09/2017)

Added a check mark in the settings for disabling processing machines that have camouflage in the kit.
Added a tick in the settings, which turns all the modified camouflage into "skins without dirt" on all tanks.
2.5.5 (13.09.2017)

Fixed the disappearance of marks on guns and other elements of customization of tanks.
11/09/2017

Now the camouflage setting through the button in the setup menu sets this camouflage immediately. Before that, I had to re-enter the Hangar.
09/09/2017

The processing of premium tanks with camouflage in the kit is disabled.
Now there is no need to monitor the uniqueness of the identifiers of modified camouflage. It is enough that they are unique within a single file.
Fixed a difficult bug in the Angara, connected with the inability to "buy" camouflage on a tank, which is not processed by the mod because it was included in the disable section.
2.5.4 (08.28.2017)

Edits at 9.20.
Modified camouflage have moved along the new "old" path - mods / configs / PYmods / CamoSelector / camouflages / camo_name. Now you do not need a .wotmod package for every camouflage. The archives in the header are updated.
03/05/2017

Fixed the configuration settings and the processing of international camouflage.
Fixed a bug in removal of CamoSelector camouflages selected through the customization window.
Fixed the processing of the type of camouflage in the hangar.
2.5.2 (02.03.2017)

Numerous small logic fixes associated with the transition to 9.17.1 and
Moving to the .wotmod-package.
2.5.0 (16.12.2016)

International camouflage is placed in a separate "subgroup".
Now you can switch between nations by selecting a tank in the carousel without fear of losing all the changes made. The nation in the settings switches automatically.
The menu remembers the last selected camouflage for each nation within one session (when the client is restarted, the numbers of the camouflages selected in the menu will be reset).
Related minor edits of the logic of fashion.
2.4.0 (13.12.2016)

The concept of over-riding is brought to mind.
Go to modsCore 2.0.
Now the flash drive displays only the nation of the selected tank. Also, the choice of camouflage automatically previews it on the current tank, and the button with the tank is equivalent to pressing Ctrl + F5. Well, the button "Apply" is renamed "Save".
2.2.0 (25.11.2016)

Added the promised customization of standard camouflage.
2.0.0 (11/09/2016)

The way it's meant to be made.
0.9.0 (12/10/2016)

Beta release.
package.description:
Installer of their own and / or casual camouflage aka CamoSelector

Modification allows you to create your own camouflage for tanks.
Also there is a functional for free installation of existing patterns in the game on any tank.
In the mod fully functional mode WoTRC authored by tratatank.
Mod allows not only to distribute all random camouflage (or all the same, or one allies, other enemies, or ...), but also allows them to completely turn them off.
You can also selectively disable only purchased camouflage (if you need to strictly color the tanks of allies and enemies, for example, a useful feature when using WGL camouflage, which are also included in the mod.)

package.name: transparent camouflage for all tanks
package.description: removes the camouflage patterns of all tanks

package.name: remove graphics on tanks
package.description: Makes decals, inscriptions, camouflages and/or clan-logos invisible on tanks

package.name: on all tanks
package.description: Makes decals, inscriptions, camouflages and/or clan-logos invisible for all tanks

package.name: Clan Logo Remover
package.updateComment: Some clan logos may cause a crash to desktop with no python log file
package.description: will make clan logos transparent for all tanks. No more tiny icons messing up with your skins.

package.name: Transparent Nation Decals
package.description: removes the nation decals (Balkenkreuz, etc.) of all tanks.

package.name: Stickers and Inscriptions Remover
package.description: This will remove Stickers, Inscriptions, and MOE from all tanks.

package.name: Limpid Stickers v{version} by goofy67
package.description: Makes decals, inscriptions, camouflages and/or clan-logos invisible, configurable for any tank separately.\n\nOpen configuration-window via Modifications-Listi-Button (lower-right corner in hangar)

package.name: Skinner
package.description:
This mod dynamically edits vehicle model paths, which enables it to selectively apply weakspot skins only on your vehicle, allies and/or enemies. Also it can add so-called “dynamic” skins - the ones that only appear on a vehicle you are looking at. Vehicles affected by RemodEnabler are not processed. All configuration can be made in hangar.

Hotkeys (hangar only):
Ctrl+F1 - enables a dynamic skin on current vehicle if it is present. (You need to switch to ally or enemy preview mode, because the player can never have a dynamic skin applied.)
Ctrl+F2 - cycles between vehicle preview modes (Player -> Ally -> Enemy -> Player…).

package.name: Colored damage stickers (paintball mod)
package.description: Allows you to see where to penetrate the enemy better, or see where the enemy is penetrating you

package.name: Marks Of Excellence (insignia on gun barrel)

package.description:
RemodEnabler is required for the models to display.
Differences from the original mod:
Ability to install the models seectively, for example - only on player vehicle. That solves the problem of proper treating of an enemy vehicle of the same type, which appearance would be changed by the original mod as well (for example, the enemy KV-2 would look the same in all configurations).
Doesn’t require config fixing upon game client update -> compatible with all client versions (if the RemodEnabler itself doesn’t break).
